channel.title: Drinks on Lam Family Cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in Drinks on Lam Family Cookbook

item.title: Milk and Orange Drink
item.description: Ingredients 380g orange juice, fresh from approx 5 oranges 400g evaporated milk, frozen into cubes 100g sugar Method Place all ingredients into mixing bowl, blend 30sec.speed 10. Serve and drink immediately.

item.title: Tumeric Tea
item.description: Original image filename: Tumeric_tea.jpg Ingredients 1/3 cup or 80ml good raw honey 1 1/2 tsp dried tumeric Lemon lots of freshly ground black pepper Method Work the turmeric into the honey until it forms a paste.

item.title: Chinese Almond Tea
item.description: Ingredients 100g Chinese almonds (sweet - South Almonds) 1 tablespoon Chinese almonds (bitter - North almonds) (Mine are premixed, so I just used 100g of my mix) 10g white rice (original recipe states 20g, just adjust the amount for the desired thickness.
